summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.4°C) and outside temperature (down 3.2°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 6993 lux) and cloud levels (up 344 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14480 lux), cloud levels (up 1806 m), feels like temperature (up 6.3°C), and outside temperature (up 5.2°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 922.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. Changeable conditions.
